body: Well, I recently joined this server not too long ago, and I hope to have a great experience here, like many other places. I suppose I should get active here and get off on a good start, but I'm not really too sure about all the commands. Here goes, Ask me anything! :P

replies.body: Hey there friend, welcome to the server :D

replies.body:
@puffycloud5751: Who doesn't like food?! Sour Patch Kids or any bag of chips I can find to devour
@HoboMatty: Dogs ofc! My favorite junk food would probably be chips of some sort (i.e. Pringles, Hot Cheetos, Takis)
@roboticboy16: Ohaidere, I don't mean to intrude but wanted to check this server out from DoctaPop or others, then found it actually really fun and addicting! :D
@CrafterPete1013: Well, haven't really played anything but Nebula and Nexus, so the only other choice would have to be Nexus! XD (I always choose the ones I see have the most players on)
@cinnamoncroc000: Here goes: League of Legends, Dota 2, Counterstrike Global Offensive, Minecraft, World of Warcraft, Starcraft 1+2, Hearthstone, Wii Super Smash Bros Brawl, Diablo 3 (quit), and some random Internet games that you probably won't care about.
@steven5703: Hmmm, I don't seem to remember you... I totally don't remember you from someplace... (not sarcasm)
@Ducksfanwaterloo: Yey, you replied to this thread! :D I want to know how to friend people, I don't want to be a loner ;-;
@kycrafft: Nah, I already have a Minecraft lover :P
